symbols.name: sap.ui.documentation
symbols.description: SAPUI5 library with controls specialized for administrative applications.

constructor.description: Handles application errors by automatically attaching to the model events and displaying errors when needed.

methods.name: extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata

methods.description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.ErrorHandler with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.base.Object.extend}.

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.ErrorHandler.
